analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol:
	Contract Bithenet has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#286-287)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.0', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.0
	- /unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#70 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (/unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#1): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#70): it allows old versions
Parameter '_numProposals' of Ballot.Ballot (/unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#19-20) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0xbcd1072f9b35499f75f23a9711712fc7ef08eba7.sol#157-158) is not in mixedCase
